resources.string: Welcome to Patons Rock Beach Villas. We are a fully self Check-In service. To Check-in please press the check-in button. This will let us know you have arrived and allow you to ask for servicing. Once you check in your credit card will be charged unless otherwise arranged. If you have any questions or problems please contact us on 0800 306 697 . Your Hosts Kimberley and Wade hope you enjoy your stay

When checking out its as easy as leaving the key on the table and walking out. If your thinking of booking again visit www.patonsrockbeachvillas.co.nz or call us on 0800 306 697 We hope you enjoyed your stay with us at our Villas.
